name: Seahaven 2000
overview: A patience card game by DawnBringer. This is a fully playable solitaire game written by Richard DawnBringer Fhager in AMOS inspired by the Silicon Graphics version. Multiple cards can be moved at the same time. Auto move. HiRes graphics and a card locator built-in. Planned updates like an undo and statistics were never implemented. Cards of the same suit can be stacked in descending order, cards can be temporarily placed in the four slots.
